entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Masset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Masset Municipal Airport 10:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.4°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain except snow over northern sections near noon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
